Posts.Content:
Dear HealingWell members,
I first thank Peter for allowing me to post this research participation call. 
We are researchers from Michigan State University, Purdue University, and Korea University. We are developing better ways to provide social support to patients. In order to do so, we need your help in helping us understand your experiences in using online health communities. 
Please visit our website here to understand our project and methods to participate in an online survey. The study participants will be entered into a random drawing to win a $100 Amazon gift card if they complete the survey. 
https://www.msu.edu/~jinahuh/other/visohc.html
If you'd like, we will share the research results with you so you can improve your group as well.
Thank you,
Jina Huh
Assistant Professor, Department of Media and Information
Adjunct Assistant Professor, College of Nursing
Adjunct Assistant Professor, College of Engineering
Michigan State University
404 Wilson Road, Rm 409 (office: 418)
East Lansing, MI 48824
Office: 517-432-3378
Fax: 517-355-1292
email: jinahuh@msu.edu
website: http://www.msu.edu/~jinahuh
Posts.Title: Online survey on online health community use
